title: Two-Year-Old Child Shot in North St. Louis
content:
ST. LOUIS (KMOX) – A two year old child and a woman are shot overnight in north St. Louis. It happened around 10:45 p.m. Friday on Kossuth near Marcus in the Penrose neighborhood. Both were hit in the foot. They’re in stable condition.
Another person was shot around 3:30 Saturday morning on North 13th at Cass. He was conscious and breathing.
A male victim is hospitalized after he was shot around 4:40 Saturday morning at Lee and North Grand near Fairground Park. He’s in stable condition.
